text:
Always a huge fan of flavoured butter because it just elevates your entire eating experience by levels ‚ú®. Arden handcrafts Artisanal Butter in really unique flavours and they just truly hit üòç.

üåü Chunky Miso Shiitake
You really get some shiitake chunks within so you know it's the real deal ;). The Miso butter was really fragrant and savoury, which just paired so so well with the sourdough toast!! Really, just top it up with cheese and airfry your toast. Perfect combination of miso flavours, melted cheese and a sour twang from the sourdough and sun-dried tomatoes ü§§. Spreading this to plain bread is more than enough to add good flavours.

Sundried Tomato and Basil
Tomato butter was pretty light yet elevates the tomato flavours of the sourdough I bought to pair with. Such a great addition, and I just loved how her different butters can truly elevate and change up the flavours of your food so so well!

SO SO GOOD tried their chunky miso mushroom and roasted red capsicum cashew and omg‚Ä¶.. i‚Äôm so so sold!!! and not to mention they use fresh & premium ingredients so it‚Äôs rly super worth your money ü•π go & try!!! rly rly yummy :,)))
Really love the Loaded Bacon & Cheese Butter and Chunky Miso Shiitake Butter! Both butters goes well simply with eggs and toast! ü§§ Will definitely buy again!
Tried out some Caramelised Onion & Bacon Butter from Borderlessbutter. Loved the convenience it brings to meal preps and its rich smoky flavour!
Versatile miso shiitake butter that's good on anything! From toast to potatoes and you name it! It's good with roasted vegetables too.
